text: Allah eppati oru camukattinarai nerana valiyil celuttuvan. Avarkalo, tankalitam vanta pala attatcikalin mulam niccayamaka (allahvutaiya) tutar unmaiyanavar ena catciyam kuri nampikkai kontatan pinnarum (attutarai) nirakarikkinranar. Allah (ittakaiya) aniyayakkara camukattinarai nerana valiyil celuttuvatillai
